name: PlayStation 5 Console
description: Experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers and 3D Audio, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation games.

name: Xbox Elite Wireless Controller
description: Premium gaming controller with interchangeable components, including thumbsticks, D-pads, and paddles. Customize button mapping and adjust trigger sensitivity.

name: HyperX Cloud II Gaming Headset
description: 7.1 virtual surround sound gaming headset with memory foam ear cushions, noise-cancelling microphone, and durable aluminum frame.

name: Secretlab TITAN Gaming Chair
description: Award-winning ergonomic gaming chair with premium materials, full-length adjustable armrests, and built-in lumbar support.

name: Samsung Odyssey G7 Gaming Monitor
description: 27" curved QLED gaming monitor with 240Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Advanced health and fitness tracking with always-on Retina display, ECG app, and seamless integration with iPhone.

name: Fitbit Charge 6
description: Advanced fitness tracker with built-in GPS, heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life.

name: Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen)
description: Smart speaker with Alexa, improved audio, and smart home hub capabilities. Control your devices with voice commands.

name: Philips Hue Smart Bulbs Starter Kit
description: Set of 4 color-changing smart LED bulbs with hub. Control lighting with app, voice, or automation.

name: Ring Indoor Cam
description: Compact WiFi security camera with 1080p HD video, two-way talk, and motion detection alerts.

name: JBL Flip 6 Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable waterproof speaker with powerful bass, 12-hour battery life, and PartyBoost feature.

name: Blue Yeti USB Microphone
description: Professional USB condenser microphone with multiple pickup patterns. Perfect for streaming, podcasting, and recording.

name: Logitech C920 HD Pro Webcam
description: Full HD 1080p webcam with stereo audio and automatic light correction. Ideal for video calls and streaming.

name: XGIMI Horizon Pro Projector
description: Portable 4K projector with Android TV, auto keystone correction, and 2,200 ANSI lumens brightness.

name: Keychron K8 Mechanical Keyboard
description: Wireless mechanical keyboard with hot-swappable switches, RGB backlight, and Mac/Windows compatibility.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S
description: Advanced wireless mouse with ultra-precise scrolling, customizable buttons, and multi-device connectivity.

name: Rain Design mStand Laptop Stand
description: Aluminum laptop stand with cable management. Elevates screen to eye level for better ergonomics.

name: Anker 7-Port USB Hub
description: Powered USB 3.0 hub with 7 ports and LED indicators. Transfer data at speeds up to 5Gbps.

name: Anker PowerLine III USB-C Cable
description: 6ft USB-C to USB-C cable with 100W power delivery and 10Gbps data transfer speed.

name: Sony WF-1000XM5 Earbuds
description: Premium noise-canceling wireless earbuds with exceptional sound quality and 8-hour battery life.

name: Spigen Tempered Glass Screen Protector
description: 9H hardness tempered glass with oleophobic coating. Easy installation and bubble-free application.

name: Elago MS3 Phone Stand
description: Silicone phone stand with scratch-free base. Compatible with all smartphones and cases.

name: Anker PowerCore 20000mAh
description: High-capacity portable charger with dual USB ports and PowerIQ technology for fast charging.

name: DJI Mini 3 Pro Drone
description: Lightweight 4K drone with 34-minute flight time, obstacle avoidance, and intelligent flight modes.

name: Anki Cozmo Educational Robot
description: AI-powered robot with personality, games, and coding capabilities. Perfect for learning and fun.

name: USB Desktop Vacuum Cleaner
description: Mini vacuum for keyboard and desk cleaning. USB-powered with dual motor and LED light.

name: Victorinox Swiss Army Knife USB
description: Classic Swiss Army knife with integrated 32GB USB flash drive. Practical multi-tool.

name: Meta Quest 3 VR Headset
description: Next-gen VR headset with mixed reality capabilities, 4K+ Infinite Display, and powerful performance.
